title: Unable to comment (news section)
body:
In the news section, when i try to comment it tells me i am not authorized ;-;. does anyone know why and what i can do to fix this?
Thanks!

replies.body:
It's possible that your Summoner and Boards profiles hadn't updated in a while. Since this discussion was posted, it should have forced a resync and resolved the issue. 

Let me know if this issue persists.
